name: Project Exo
description:
Project Exo is a Movement based puzzle, Platforming game. You will be soaring through levels using your rocket launcher and rocket boots to navigate each puzzle. I have gained great inspiration from my favorite games (Portal, TF2, Unreal tournament, Quake, CSGO) and mashed them all together to make something I love and I hope all of you will too.


- The tools you will have to help you get through puzzles are Rocket launcher / Rocket boots / Double jump / Bunny hopping / Power-cell

- A Timer that displays your best times per level and an overall time display for all levels combined

- 15 Slow motion tutorial levels to help you get an understanding of the mechanics and some additional short videos showing the mechanics in action

- 20 Normal levels with increasing difficulty

- An unlockable playground level that gives you a behind the scenes look at the development process
